sourcesContent:
export const languageData = {
    "Norwegian": {
        prompt: "Hei! Jeg er en vennlig AI-generert språklærer. Hva ønsker du å snakke om?",
        specialCharacters: [
            "\u00E6", // Unicode for 'æ'
            "\u00F8", // Unicode for 'ø'
            "\u00E5", // Unicode for 'å'
            "\u00C6", // Unicode for 'Æ'
            "\u00D8", // Unicode for 'Ø'
            "\u00C5"  // Unicode for 'Å'
          ],

    },
    "French": {
        prompt: "Bonjour! Je suis une IA sympathique. De quoi veux-tu parler?",
        specialCharacters: [
            "\u00E0", // à - a with grave accent
            "\u00E2", // â - a with circumflex
            "\u00E6", // æ - ae ligature
            "\u00E7", // ç - c with cedilla
            "\u00E9", // é - e with acute accent
            "\u00E8", // è - e with grave accent
            "\u00EA", // ê - e with circumflex
            "\u00EB", // ë - e with diaeresis
            "\u00EF", // ï - i with diaeresis
            "\u00F4", // ô - o with circumflex
            "\u0153", // œ - oe ligature
            "\u00FC", // ü - u with diaeresis
            "\u00FF", // ÿ - y with diaeresis
        ],

    },

    "German": {
        prompt: "Hallo! Ich bin ein freundlicher KI-Sprachlehrer. Worüber möchten Sie sprechen?",
        specialCharacters: [
            "\u00E4", // ä - a with diaeresis
            "\u00F6", // ö - o with diaeresis
            "\u00FC", // ü - u with diaeresis
            "\u00C4", // Ä - A with diaeresis
            "\u00DC", // Ü - U with diaeresis
            "\u00DF", // ß - sharp s (Eszett)
          ],

    },
    
};
